PipeOpPCA

Source: R/PipeOpPCA.R
mlr_pipeop_pca.Rd

Extracts principle components from data.

See stats::prcomp for details and parameters.

PipeOpPCA

Format

R6Class object inheriting from PipeOpTaskPreproc.

See also

Other PipeOps: PipeOpEnsemble, PipeOpTaskPreproc, PipeOp, mlr_pipeop_NULL, mlr_pipeop_branch, mlr_pipeop_chunk, mlr_pipeop_copy, mlr_pipeop_encode, mlr_pipeop_featureunion, mlr_pipeop_filter, mlr_pipeop_learner, mlr_pipeop_majorityvote, mlr_pipeop_modelavg, mlr_pipeop_nloptmajorityvote, mlr_pipeop_scale, mlr_pipeop_subsample, mlr_pipeop_unbranch, mlr_pipeop_undersample, mlr_pipeops

Examples

# Instantiate PipeOpPCA
op1 = PipeOpPCA$new()
